desc: SpecialEntityReplace-Person is a task-specific transformation of sentiment analysis, this transformation will identify some special person name in the sentence, randomly replace it with other entity names of the same kind

examples.ori: Brilliant and moving performances by Tom Courtenay.
examples.trans: Brilliant and moving performances by Clive Smith.

examples.ori: I don't like the actor Tim Hill
examples.trans: I don't like the actor Lewis Allen
